name: Rend Body II
book: Pathfinder Player Companion: Psychic Anthology © 2017, Paizo Inc.
text: This spell functions as per rend body I, but the target takes 1d8 points of damage per caster level you have (maximum 10d8). This spell can be undercast.
text_zh: 该法术的功能如同撕扯肢体I一般，除了目标承受每个你的施法者等级1d8点伤害（最大10d8点伤害）。该法术可以被降阶施法。
